full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SKYER SKANG LUGS KYI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS RGYAS PA RTA MCHOG ROL BA'I ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
